persona_profile.goals: To work in dynamic, live-event environments (e.g., theaters, concert halls) where energy and lighting systems are actively managed, blending technical expertise with creative execution—prioritizing hands-on roles that shape 'wild' electrical currents into controlled, artistic outputs.

job.title: Lighting Rigging Coordinator
required_skills: Intermediate proficiency in lighting rigging systems
Maintaining detailed documentation of equipment status and setup configurations

job.title: Stagecraft Specialist – Rigging & Fault Finding
required_skills: working independently with guidance on complex situations
physical work (lifting equipment, working at heights)

job.title: Stagehand Intern – Setup & Run
required_skills: Basic understanding of live show operations
Physical stamina for setup work and long show days

job.title: Power Systems Specialist
required_skills: maintenance and troubleshooting of electrical power systems

job.title: Specialist – Group Facilitation & Cultural Events
required_skills: working respectfully across different cultural backgrounds
adapting approach based on community needs

job.title: Assistant – Design Research Projects
required_skills: Data collection and analysis (user experience studies)
Understanding of user behavior and design methodologies
Supporting senior researchers with research data

job.title: Tourism Consultant – Events & Guest Services
required_skills: Event organization and management (planning to execution)
Local cultural and attraction knowledge (Rio de Janeiro)

job.title: Fiber Optic Intern
required_skills: environmental regulations and sustainability standards in manufacturing (familiarity)

job.title: Occupational Safety Trainee
required_skills: Willingness to learn safety regulations and procedures

job.title: Consultant – Procurement & ERP Systems
required_skills: Analytical skills for procurement data evaluation
Bridging technical systems and business requirements

job.title: Maintenance Trainee – Fleet Operations
required_skills: Basic proficiency with hand tools and maintenance equipment
Intermediate skills in technical writing and documentation
Intermediate experience with component replacement and repair procedures
Troubleshooting techniques for mechanical and electrical systems

job.title: Food Industry Intern – Quality & Safety
required_skills: Basic understanding of food safety and hygiene standards
Foundational knowledge in product development processes

job.title: Destination Promotion Assistant – Digital Presence
required_skills: Solid understanding of destination attractions and tourism offerings
Awareness of local cultural nuances and visitor expectations

job.title: Specialist – Vessel Communication & Navigation Systems
required_skills: monitoring maritime traffic and weather conditions

job.title: Design Research Intern
required_skills: Collaboration with UX designers and product managers

job.title: Customs & Vessel Communications Specialist
required_skills: Working knowledge of customs procedures and protocols
Experience communicating with maritime vessels through various channels
Ability to work under time-sensitive conditions
Documentation management (shipping manifests, customs declarations, port authority paperwork)

job.title: Senior Accountant – Auditing & Controls
required_skills: advanced knowledge of tax compliance procedures

job.title: Reception Assistant – Hospitality Services
required_skills: Hotel amenities and local attractions knowledge
